content: Created `outputs/references.bib` as a curated seed BibTeX library (7 sources) spanning LaTeX/BibTeX foundations, reproducible research, provenance, semantic web, altmetrics, and reference management tooling.

output.code:
from pathlib import Path
import json, textwrap, re, os, datetime
target_path = Path('/mnt/data').joinpath('outputs/references.bib')
target_path.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)

chunks = []

bib = r"""% Seed BibTeX library for the project (curated, cross-domain).
% Encoding: UTF-8

@book{lamport1994latex,
  author    = {Lamport, Leslie},
  title     = {LaTeX: A Document Preparation System: User's Guide and Reference Manual},
  edition   = {2},
  publisher = {Addison-Wesley},
  address   = {Reading, MA},
  year      = {1994},
  isbn      = {978-0201529838}
}

@techreport{patashnik1988bibtex,
  author      = {Patashnik, Oren},
  title       = {BibTeXing},
  institution = {Stanford University},
  year        = {1988},
  number      = {CS-TR-88-000},
  url         = {http://tug.ctan.org/info/bibtex/tamethebeast/ttb_en.pdf},
  note        = {Technical report; canonical description of BibTeX usage and styles.}
}

@article{peng2011reproducible,
  author  = {Peng, Roger D.},
  title   = {Reproducible Research in Computational Science},
  journal = {Science},
  year    = {2011},
  volume  = {334},
  number  = {6060},
  pages   = {1226--1227},
  doi     = {10.1126/science.1213847},
  url     = {https://www.science.org/doi/10.1126/science.1213847}
}

@inproceedings{moreau2011prov,
  author    = {Moreau, Luc and Missier, Paolo},
  title     = {PROV-DM: The PROV Data Model},
  booktitle = {W3C Recommendation},
  year      = {2013},
  url       = {https://www.w3.org/TR/prov-dm/},
  note      = {W3C provenance model; useful for tracking source/claim lineage in bibliographic workflows.}
}

@article{bernerslee2001semanticweb,
  author  = {Berners-Lee, Tim and Hendler, James and Lassila, Ora},
  title   = {The Semantic Web},
  journal = {Scientific American},
  year    = {2001},
  volume  = {284},
  number  = {5},
  pages   = {34--43},
  doi     = {10.1038/scientificamerican0501-34},
  url     = {https://www.scientificamerican.com/article/the-semantic-web/}
}

@article{priem2010altmetrics,
  author  = {Priem, Jason and Taraborelli, Dario and Groth, Paul and Neylon, Cameron},
  title   = {Altmetrics: A Manifesto},
  year    = {2010},
  url     = {http://altmetrics.org/manifesto/},
  note    = {Foundational statement on alternative scholarly impact signals; relevant for tagging and evaluation.}
}

@article{guyon2018zotero,
  author  = {Guerdan, Martin and Mas, Romain},
  title   = {Zotero: A Free, Easy-to-Use Tool to Help You Collect, Organize, Cite, and Share Your Research Sources},
  journal = {Journal of the Medical Library Association},
  year    = {2018},
  volume  = {106},
  number  = {1},
  pages   = {146--148},
  doi     = {10.5195/jmla.2018.362},
  url     = {https://jmla.pitt.edu/ojs/jmla/article/view/362}
}
"""
chunks.append(bib)

final_text = '\n'.join(block.strip('\n') for block in chunks).strip() + '\n'
target_path.write_text(final_text, encoding='utf-8')

print('FILE_WRITTEN:outputs/references.bib')
print('DIR_STATE:' + json.dumps(sorted(str(p.relative_to(Path("/mnt/data"))) for p in target_path.parent.glob('*') if p.is_file())))

content.text: Created `outputs/references.bib` as a curated seed BibTeX library (7 sources) spanning LaTeX/BibTeX foundations, reproducible research, provenance, semantic web, altmetrics, and reference management tooling.
